phases.description: Update README and docs with the new Dashboard section and architecture diagrams that include LlmService in the control plane.
acceptance_criteria: README.md documents Dashboard routes/views and mentions LlmService as the routing layer.
Architecture diagrams in docs/ include LlmService in the control plane.
No broken links or missing anchors introduced in README.md or docs/.

phases.description: Resolve ModuleNotFoundError for backend package in tests/backend by ensuring PYTHONPATH or package init files are configured.
acceptance_criteria: pytest collection in tests/backend/ succeeds without ModuleNotFoundError for backend.
Approach is explicit (e.g., __init__.py or sys.path/pytest ini) and documented in tests/backend/conftest.py.
No new import side effects or duplicated path entries.

phases.description: Review skipped tests (71 total) and unskip/fix test_autonomous_executor.py and test_git_rollback.py now that hardening is complete.
acceptance_criteria: Previously skipped cases in test_autonomous_executor.py and test_git_rollback.py are active and pass or are updated with valid expectations.
Remaining skips, if any, carry a justified reason in-line.
Test run `PYTHONPATH=src python -m pytest tests/` executes without new skips for these suites.

phases.description: Create a smoke script that hits the Autopack API on port 8100 to create a run and mark a phase COMPLETE for stability verification.
acceptance_criteria: Script scripts/verify_e2e_8100.py exists and defaults to http://127.0.0.1:8100.
Script posts a run to /runs/start using the plan data and updates a phase to COMPLETE, logging responses.
Graceful handling for missing API key or connection failures (clear error message and non-zero exit).
